title: Super City (Superhero Sim)
description:
Create your own superhuman and cross paths with up to 150 other heroes & villains in the ultimate shared universe! Decide where your loyalties lie and fight for control of every corner of Super City as your own unique story plays out. Inheriting an above-average combat system from the wrestling series, this game supercharges the action with new powers, technology, costumes and locations!

Upgrade to save your changes to all characters and make the world your own. This also includes starting with a character of your choice and never ending until you choose to. You can also enjoy setting up your own "Fight Scenes" to blow off steam with no pressure!

CONTROLS:
Look out for in-game hints, but the basic controls are as follows:
A = Attack (on its own to aim low, with a direction to aim high)
G = Grapple
A+G = Block
R = Run (double tap to jump or fly)
A+R = Big Attack
P = Pick-Up / Drop (with a direction to throw)
R+P = Set fire
T = Taunt, use prop, release hold
S = Special power
* Tap the portrait to transform (once activated).
* Touch the clock (or bottom of the screen) to pause the game.
* Tap the speech bubbles to speed through conversations.
* Pinch the middle of the display to zoom in or out.
www.youtube.com/MDickieDotcom

Super City depicts a fictitious universe. Any similarities to real characters past or present is purely coincidental.

recentChanges:
- Enhanced compatibility with the latest devices and operating systems.

comments: Good game, badass in its own right. Only one thing is there is the option to turn down the music but no option to turn down the sound FX? I like to jam out to horrorcore music while beating some ass, and you know Im not even gonna knock this rating to 4 stars, 5 stars all the way. Its just that one touch of an issue. No option to turn down the sound FX. Other than that, keep it up man!

It is hell of a superhero game to play, once I played this game for days in a row! You know so addictive that you forget to eat and sleep üéâ my friends loved it too.It's been ages I played it but hey, why don't developer remake this game with some additional to do things. Like this game lack of gore that I see on recent games. Maybe you should add more detail team up system, like you can recruit your teammates via currencies. A little research and resource system won't hurt. And sure add a base.

Ok so I'm back to update the review. Still a good game, still want more powers, still want more characters, still want better missions than "take over the whole city". Like, I actually wanna save people and team up with other heroes. Also add a reason to have money. And can u improve the combat system? Its too easy to just stand in one corner and spam ur laser or wtv if u have infinite power. Ik this is a lot of coding to do so I don't expect you to, but I love all your games and appreciate them

The game is fun simple and enjoyable however, I find it to be unfair how somebody grappling you and putting you in a hold can kill or knock you out randomly no matter what health you're on, and if that happens and you get knocked out then you basically lose every place you've taken over and then you have to do it all again, if the developer can sort that out that would be nice.
I love this game and one of its villain characters that mind controls people and I like how you can change into a hero and like how you can change more details. Keep up the amazing work!!!

title: Super Mecha Champions
description:
On your marks, set, go!
SMC players from all over the world have descended upon a futuristic city to battle with marvelous Mecha!
Unleash your Mecha and fight for the crown you deserve!

Exchange Fire! Incredible Mecha Brawls!
Select from an all-star lineup of Mecha and join the fierce clash with your skills.
Pilot your personal Mecha, quickly returns to battle, impose your superior resolve and abilities!

Crazy Firefights! Thrilling Combat & Cool Weapons!
An explosive combo of man and Mecha! It's more than high-tech in this arena, but how you strategize and adapt!
Plasma cannons, homing missiles, snipers, flamethrowers... Get a load of the ultra-cool weapons at your disposal!
Man vs. man, Mecha vs. Mecha... All new exciting combat experience!

Amazing Graphics! Manga-Style Cities!
Pilot Mecha through every corner and between the highrises of a contemporary ACG Japanese-style cityscape. From a pretty lass with double pony tails to a suave, winsome man, there's a parade of characters waiting for you to discover and unlock.
This is the dream arena where you're the star!

Highly Flexible! Team Up & Claim Victory!
Execute flawless attack and defense through impeccable teamwork! Utilize marvelous Mecha, diverse arsenals, and responsive control for unrivaled excitement!
Fly your Mecha through barrage of incoming shells in perfect evasion and return fire!

[Contact Us]
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/SuperMechaChampionsGlobal
Official Website: www.supermechachampions.com

comments: After the few updates that were added to this game, it has became one of my most favorite games. It has good graphics which can be adjusted to look good even on low end devices. Controls are so smooth and it's easy to manage. Onee little issue is that the game can get a bit laggy sometimes on low end devices even after adjusting the graphics, which leads to an unfair lose in a match. But other than that, the game is so perfect and I would really recommend it to all anime and battle royale fans..

The best part of the game is concept . I love it . But there are a lot of cons in this great game . The graphics is not high detailed, there is only one map and that is too much small. the bots are not challenging and they are totally boring. the communication between players is weak and the sound effects are not close to realistic. This fantastic concept of battle royale game is still very impressive. I play this regularly. But always hope them to improve it as we expect....

The game is great overall. But when I connect my Android controller to play the game, the game settings won't let the turn my character 360 degrees. The controller works great for every Android game I have and allows me to turn 360 degrees with every game. For some reason your game won't allow me to turn 360 with my controller. It only limits me to the motion of the anolog stick. So where the stock stops is my turning limit and when the stick returns to the center so does my free view.

So far so good. Completely stopped playing cyber hunter & pubg after I started paying this since a week. This game is so much fun so far. Could do a bit better with device optimizations. Also, the mic is pretty problematic on all, devices so maybe fix that too. Edit : Please add a training ground for players to try out mecha moves & practice to get better.

The matchmaking is Crazy.... My account Created few mins ago and it's level 6,i won 4 Times with it... but the 5th game I played with higher rank and tier than me... killed Tier very higher than me on 3rd position,then i think the matchmaking is Crazy,... 6 times played with opponent who have level higher than me... can you fix it?,i love your game and played over an 4 hour...

title: Super Backup & Restore
description:
The fastest data backup and restore tool on Android phones!
You can backup applications, contacts, text messages, call history, bookmarks, calendars to your SD card, Gmail, or Google Drive
You can share installation APK file  to your friends by one tap.
You will never lose your data again!

‚òÖImportant Notice #1
If you intend to do a factory reset on the phone, please make sure default backup folder is in your external SD card before doing it. If not, please copy the entire backup folder ("SmsContactsBackup" by default) to your external SD card 

‚òÖImportant Notice #2
Since Android M 6.0, access bookmarks from 3rd party application is disabled, so Super Backup cannot backup and restore bookmarks.

‚òÖImportant Notice #3
If you schedule automatic backups,  and you use some apps such as Task Killer or Memory Clear,  please make sure you had add Super Backup into their White List or Ignore list. Otherwise Super Backup can not run in background, and automatic backups will not work.

‚òÖImportant Notice #4
When you finished the SMS restore process, but the messages were not displayed in your default SMS app, please try to reboot your device.      


Features:
- Backup apps to SD card
- Backup download links for installed apps on Google Play
- Backup & restore app's data(need root)
- Batch restore apps from SD card (need root)
- One tap to share APK files
- Backup Contacts & SMS & Call logs & Bookmarks & Calendars to SD card
- Restore Contacts & SMS & Call logs & Bookmarks & Calendars from SD card
- Can select SMS conversations to backup
- Schedule automatic backups
- Auto-upload scheduled backup files to your Google Drive or Gmail
- Can download backup files from Google Drive
- User can change backup folder path in Settings
- Can backup Contact's group and picture properties

- Call Recorder: Support backup your voice call recording. It can perfectly record the phone call voices to mp3 files. Record both sides voice clearly! Ôºà‚òÖNot supported since Android 10 ‚òÖÔºâ


About PermissionsÔºö
READ YOUR TEXT MESSAGES (SMS OR MMS)/EDIT YOUR TEXT MESSAGES (SMS OR MMS)
These permissions are used to backup & restore your SMS

READ YOUR CONTACTS/MODIFY YOUR CONTACTS
These permissions are used to backup & restore your Contacts

WRITE WEB BOOKMARKS AND HISTORY/READ YOUR WEB BOOKMARKS AND HISTORY
These permissions are used to backup & restore your Bookmarks

READ CALENDAR EVENTS PLUS CONFIDENTIAL INFORMATION/ADD OR MODIFY CALENDAR EVENTS AND SEND EMAIL TO GUESTS WITHOUT OWNERS' KNOWLEDGE
These permissions are used to backup & restore your Calendars

READ CALL LOG/WRITE CALL LOG
These permissions are used to backup & restore your Call logs

RECORD_AUDIO
These permissions are used to recording  your voice call

recentChanges: Fix bug: Google Drive connection failed
comments: It backups important cell phone data in a user friendly manner with several options that make this app very flexible. It has the option to automatically upload the backup files to Google Drive. It also automatically records my phone calls. What else can I ask for? A+!

Suddenly Google drive upload has been not working. This is the error message. "Super backup requires one or more google service which are currently not available. Contact the developer". Hai bro, google integration is working now. But, it is always showing a error "unable to backup to drive".

I really want to give this app 5 stars; it is the only one with all the features I want without rooting my phone, but the EXTREMELY ANNOYING tricky click bait just to exit the app makes it a no go for me. It doesn't have to be like that, man. Who's paying you to do that?
Backups various fatal on your phone. Too many deceptive ads. They make it seem like you have to accept the ad as part of the backup. I use the tool. But very cautiously.
Nice app but missing clock backup.  > add clock to backup to save alarms, alarms with labeled texts/ notes.  Also, doing a backup to "added cities" in clocks is beneficial for restoring.

title: Super Mario Run
description:
A new kind of Mario game that you can play with one hand.

You control Mario by tapping as he constantly runs forward. You time your taps to pull off stylish jumps, midair spins, and wall jumps to gather coins and reach the goal!

Super Mario Run can be downloaded for free and after you purchase the game, you will be able to play all the modes with no additional payment required. You can try out all four modes before purchase: World Tour, Toad Rally, Remix 10, and Kingdom Builder.

‚ñ†World Tour
Run and jump with style to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser‚Äôs clutches! 
Travel through plains, caverns, ghost houses, airships, castles, and more.

Clear the 24 exciting courses to rescue Princess Peach from Bowser, waiting in his castle at the end. There are many ways to enjoy the courses, such as collecting the 3 different types of colored coins or by competing for the highest score against your friends. You can try courses 1-1 to 1-4 for free.

After rescuing Princess Peach, a nine-course special world, World Star, will appear.

‚ñ†Remix 10
Some of the shortest Super Mario Run courses you'll ever play!
This mode is Super Mario Run in bite-sized bursts! You'll play through 10 short courses one after the other, with the courses changing each time you play. Daisy is lost somewhere in Remix 10, so try to clear as many courses as you can to find her!

‚ñ†Toad Rally
Show off Mario‚Äôs stylish moves, compete against your friends, and challenge people from all over the world.

In this challenge mode, the competition differs each time you play.
Compete against the stylish moves of other players for the highest score as you gather coins and get cheered on by a crowd of Toads. Fill the gauge with stylish moves to enter Coin Rush Mode to get more coins. If you win the rally, the cheering Toads will come live in your kingdom, and your kingdom will grow. 

‚ñ†Kingdom Builder
Gather coins and Toads to build your very own kingdom.

Combine different buildings and decorations to create your own unique kingdom. There are over 100 kinds of items in Kingdom Builder mode. If you get more Toads in Toad Rally, the number of buildings and decorations available will increase. With the help of the friendly Toads you can gradually build up your kingdom.

‚ñ†What You Can Do After Purchasing All Worlds

„Éª All courses in World Tour are playable
Why not try out the bigger challenges and thrills available in all courses?

„Éª Easier to get Rally Tickets
It's easier to get Rally Tickets that are needed to play Remix 10 and Toad Rally. You can collect them in Kingdom Builder through Bonus Game Houses and ? Blocks, by collecting colored coins in World Tour, and more.

„Éª More playable characters
If you rescue Princess Peach by completing course 6-4 and build homes for Luigi, Yoshi, and Toadette in Kingdom Builder mode, you can get them to join your adventures as playable characters. They play differently than Mario, so why not put their special characteristics to good use in World Tour and Toad Rally?

„Éª More courses in Toad Rally
The types of courses available in Toad Rally will increase to seven different types of courses, expanding the fun! Along with the new additions, Purple and Yellow Toads may also come to cheer for you.

„Éª More buildings and decorations in Kingdom Builder
The types of buildings available will increase, so you'll be able to make your kingdom even more lively. You can also place Rainbow Bridges to expand your kingdom.

„Éª Play Remix 10 without having to wait
You can play Remix 10 continuously, without having to wait between each game.

*Internet connectivity required to play. Data charges may apply. May contain advertisements.

comments: This is a incredible game but i think it would be nice to have a pokey statue as a placeable item in your kingdom. Pokey is a recurring enemy in the mario franchise who adds a lot to the desert but for some reason BLOOPER who is not even in mario run has a statue. I am not saying blooper is bad, i just want to make it clear that it would be a good idea to include a pokey statue in the game.

Remix10 is a game of chance a lot of times and it's almost as if they tease you when you get the 100 coin mushroom or star by dangling it over your head in a bubble and when you try to jump for it, they snatch it up higher. Maybe make Remix10 a little bit better by making it possible to collect all coins or at least be able to replay the match to try again.

I really like this game. There are basically multiple games in one and the challenge makes it very addictive. However it crashes at least 2-3 times a day. If it crashes while playing the remix, it doesn't take your ticket but when it crashes while playing the rally, not only does it take your ticket, it also causes you to lose the rally and then when you reload the app, it tells you that because you left the rally the number of your toads has now decreased as well. This is VERY annoying.

I love the game, I bought it years ago. It filled allot of my time and is very fun. Three are different modes to keep your interest, so you won't soon be bored! But now I'm on a different device and sadly, I can't recover my purchase. If I could, this would be five stars!

Best Mario game period when you purchase it you get two games in one and man just love it! Glad I made the in app purchase. Love that you can can save it to an account and start of if you need to, I wanted to do that to learn how to play good job Nintendo, love being able to play it with one hand! Love how you can make it easy or hard. This is the best Mario game in the world. Nuff said. Works good on my phone which is a LG tribute hd.

title: Super Brawl Universe
description:
Join iconic characters from Nickelodeon‚Äôs all-time, most popular shows to battle it out in the ultimate action showdown! All your favorite Nicktoons have answered the brawl call: SpongeBob, Avatar Aang, the Rugrats, the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles and lots more! 
 
Let‚Äôs get ready to BRAWL!
 
BRAWL WITH YOUR FAVORITE CHARACTERS
- Recruit new and classic characters from across the Nickelodeon cartoon universe!
- Combine your favorite Nicktoons for the world‚Äôs wildest teamups! Will it be Squidward, Invader Zim and Leonardo? Or will it be Korra, Danny Phantom and Rocko? You decide!
- Activate each character's unique ability, from recharging health to extra critical hits to temporary invincibility! 
- Show off your top brawlers in Character Spotlight events!
 
GET SLIMED!
- Collect Nick Slime to upgrade your fighters into unbeatable brawlers
- Unleash super moves like Raph‚Äôs tonfa smash, Tommy Pickles‚Äô baby rattle and SpongeBob‚Äôs imaginaaation rainbow blast!
- Power up with new tasks and events every single day!
 
ENTER THE TOURNAMENT
- Test your skills in 1-on-1 matches, epic 3-on-3 brawls and story challenges 
- Climb to the top of season leaderboards for new brawlers and costumes!
- From the Avatar Air Temple to the Krusty Krab! Travel across the Nick universe and battle it out in incredible locations like Invader Zim‚Äôs lab, the Loud House and more! 

Compatibility:
Super Brawl Universe was specifically designed to work on as many devices as possible, optimized to work on the following:
 
Samsung Galaxy S6/S6 Edge/S6 Edge+, S7/S7 Edge, S8/S8 Plus, A5, A8+, S9/S9+

title: Super Stylist - Dress Up & Style Fashion Guru
description:
BREAKING NEWS: There‚Äôs a new fashion stylist to the stars in town, and it just so happens to be you! In this fashion story game, it‚Äôs all about word of mouth. Make sure your dress up and makeup fashion styling is on point so you can build up a big client base. Be seen! Go to fancy schmancy events with your clients and take pics for their Stylagram so they can show off your dress up and makeup style skills, in this fashion story game. 
You‚Äôve just realized that you could turn your mad shopping, dress up and makeup skills into money‚Ä¶ by being a super stylist girl! Now, anybody who‚Äôs anybody will come to you, because you‚Äôre the girl who knows just how to style them. Create perfect stylist looks for your customers. Join them at their VIP events and photograph them so the world can see how awesomely talented you are. 

Features:
> Open a fashion stylist business and build up an impressive client base, in this awesome fashion story game.  
> Dress up your clients in fab styles they can wear proudly to specific events, from casual date nights to red carpet premieres. 
> Use your stylist bank to buy the clothes, and make a profit when you sell the items to your clients. 
> Listen carefully to what your clients are looking for so you can choose their clothes wisely from different collections.
> The better you do, the more fashion dress up collections you can unlock.
> No girl‚Äôs look is complete without the right accessories and killer shoes. 
> If you want your clients to recommend you to their friends, they‚Äôve got to look great from head to toe! Give the girls a hairstyle to remember. 
> Give your clients makeup looks that will make them the envy of all the girls. 
> Once their makeup is on point, accompany them to celeb-filled events and snap fashion style pics for their Stylagram. Make sure they tag you in their pics! It‚Äôs a fashion story dream come true!

Watch movies, stream TV shows, and enjoy your own personalized streaming library!

Watch shows, stream movies, browse episodes, and more. Here‚Äôs what you have access to on all Hulu plans:

Hulu

Episodes of those shows will stream uninterrupted ‚Äî there will just be a quick ad before and after each video. Plus, you can download from thousands of titles to watch offline.**

Hulu + Live TV

With Hulu + Live TV you can watch live and on-demand TV from 60+ top channels, including live news, sports, and more. Plus, get unlimited access to the entire Hulu streaming library through our ad-supported plan. No cable required.

Whether you want to watch live news and sports or stream TV shows with Hulu, you can choose the plan that works for you.

recentChanges: Feeling the luck of the Irish? Well, you best be wearing Hulu green or else‚Ä¶ Our leprechauns pinched some bugs and made improvements to some accessibility features and messaging. Be sure to update to this latest version of our app.
comments: Hulu live TV no ads it's a joke, every show I tried to watch has commercials. I cancelled, then resubscribed to get Hulu no ads for $11.99 a month, most all of the shows are actually commercial free. The only problem is the library is limited. ABC, NBC, and FOX shows are great with no ads. They have the current episodes, as well as classic TV shows. You have to wait until 2 am the next day to watch new episodes. You can watch General Hospital after 5pm the same day, which is cool .

Hulu is great when it works, but that's only sometimes. The app is laggy and slow, plenty of weird errors, sometimes it just refuse to start. Poor customer service, almost no feedback when something goes wrong which is often. LiveTV crash or just refuse to work, and more commercials than you expect to see, especially if you pay for "Hulu (No Ads)" Will be looking elsewhere. I spend more time watching the free streaming services more, just because I'm sick of fighting with Hulu to get it to work correctly.

Always something to watch and great selection. Just when you think you've watched everything you could possibly watch they come out with a new series or new movie. My favorite are the Hulu Originals those are some of the best TV shows the movies I've seen yet. I watch Hulu on a regular basis probably about oh I'd say an hour or two a day every day of the week and I'm still finding new stuff I've never run out not to mention they have way better programming than Netflix. So yes I like my Hulu.

Love this app. Beat the area cable company by a mile. Always something to watch and the DVR is amazing. Just one problem the past few days. It has started to buffer a lot. Thought it might be a device cleaning issue. But cleaning doesn't help. Hoping the new update will take care of this. Other than that, I love this.

Every update stops working. Somehow when you go to Hulu help it is always your device that is supposedly the problem. Every other streaming service works just fine oily problem is Hulu. Now if I travel I have to connect to my home network. Seriously, the idea of me paying for a streaming service is so I could login and use it on my tablet or computer while traveling. Price keeps going up and service keeps getting worse. Too many other services out now to stay with Hulu.

title: Super Mechs
description:
Liberate a post-apocalyptic world. Assemble your own invincible war robots and battle for victory!

Super Mechs is a breathtaking turn-based action game that provides you with a unique chance to create an invincible super robot!

Choose your weapons, armor and more to build your Mech warrior robot. 
Create your own style and become the ultimate fighting robot.

Fight against your friends and rivals from all over the world in epic PvP battles, participate in the Super Mechs weekly tournament or advance your Mech through the single-player campaign missions.
Each fight you compete in will give you the opportunity to improve your Mech and advance in your quest to become the greatest Mech Gladiator out there.

There can be only one! Do you accept the challenge?

MAIN FEATURES:

- Tactical Turn-based combat
- Single player campaign: Fight against battle Mech robots and collect rewards
- PvP matchmaking: Compete against real players from all over the world
- Total control over your Mech warrior's configuration
- Play and chat in real-time
- Join an alliance of Mech warriors ‚Äì or start your own!

Super Mechs is a war robot game that tests your logic and wit. Be brave and fight for victory against other war robots worldwide in a unique single-player campaign and challenging PVP battles.
Important notes:
Super Mechs is a unique battle bots MMO action game that requires an active and stable internet connection.

_____________________________________________
Visit our official forum at http://community.tacticsoft.net/c/supermechs
Follow us on Twitter at https://twitter.com/supermechs or like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/SuperMechsCommunity to get more info about all our upcoming events.
Check out our videos and game trailers on YouTube at http://bit.ly/supermechsyoutube

comments: The game used to be so great before something happened, there used to be an item shop, you could buy crates with the coins that they load you with, not anymore. The campaign is trash and they removed everything that you can buy with coins, no more gold crates, it's all just premium and extra premium. And the online chat keeps freezing and I have to restart everytime. If you guys want to know what five star looks like, look at the state of this game in 2016.

I would actually give it a 4.7, cause I mostly can't get good items cause of rarity on items, the gameplay and graphics could have been a bit better. But overall the game is beautiful. I really enjoy it!! Plz update more when you get the chance. I also need good stuff. My chance at items are poor.

Why the hell does my game, occasionally when i start it up, its just pure black after the "welcome" message? Edit: the new pvp system is total dingus, the old one where you could choose between 1v1, 2v2, and 3v3 was better. Now your just forced to play different ones at different ranks. Overall the game was great before, but it's kinda went downhill from where it was

This damnable game FORCES you to watch adds for free! Even when you're just trying to start a new stage. And to make things worse... The adds are made um such a way that you CAN'T CHOOSE NOT TO WATCH, as trying to hit "back" on your phone opens the adds' page automatically and the add will still roll until done. A very unpleasant move in my sincere opinion.

I don t like that when an drop rate increased is happening, u show the item but you don t give even its name to see if its good, what I say is, I can give a lot of tokens, for a shot in the dark and if I get the item, maybe It wouldn t be good, or as worth as 335 tokens. So please think about at least saying the name of the item at the drop rate increased deals, thank you

comments: Loved the game a year back and still loved it. Completed all three difficulties both times. Those who are complaining about the bad controls, difficulty etc are clearly dyslexic. Increase the difficulty pleaseüòçüòÅ. Loved it.
It is a fun and cool game. You get to attack and protect your team.
Enjoyed completely might need more space fore supports to be fully upgraded but still a wonderful game. Thanks for giving me something to do and be lazy to.
It's OK ylthe game is kind of a copy and the super heroes powers are disappointing.
May you please add alot of maps and heroes, and some more power ups and villians, this game would be better if you did that

comments: It is frustrating and seemingly predatory having so many ads and "offers" in a game that's clearly for children. title: Super Slime Simulator: Satisfying ASMR & DIY Games
description:
Play with slime on your mobile device. Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like you would with real slime or goo. Enjoy that oddly satisfying feeling without the mess or sticky fingers!
With tons of slimes to choose from, this app is for slime noobs and pro slime veterans, young and old, boys and girls! You can even take animated pictures of your slime and share them with your friends using your favorite social media apps.

App features:

- Play with your simulated slime right on your phone.
- Realistic slime simulation: Stretch it, squish it, knead it, pop it - just like real slime!
- Rich slime gallery: Gooey, fluffy, cheesy, glittering and many more.
- Introducing: Magical Slimes! Kids, don‚Äôt try to make these at home - because you can‚Äôt!
- The Ugliest & Yuckiest: Flesh, brains, worms and more - these WILL gross out your friends.
- Not all slimes were created equal: Unique texture, color and behavior for each slime.
- DIY! Create your very own slime. Choose from multiple materials, colors and even add glitter, foam and other amazing stuff.
- Fun area: enjoy great slime activities including: Guessing Game & Slime Painter.
- Shake it till you make it: Shake your phone to undo stretches.
- Oddly Satisfying Sounds: Turn up the volume and listen to your slime squishing as you touch it.
- Take animated pictures of your slime and share them with everyone!

FOLLOW US at
Instagram @superslimesimulator

Other than wanting more card, it is a five star app. P.S. If anyone who wants the game reads this, there are alot of card to get. I have played this game for a while

This is a wonderful game! You can make, and play with the slime you created, which is pretty fun, specially if you can't make your own in real life. Though, I do have a few complaints. I think the sounds could be better and the graphics, but it is still great at how realistic it is. I have a few comments. Perhaps, you could make something like users making slime and posting it for others to see and play, and they can like, and favorite.

I love this game. It gave a lot of optional different ways to make slime.And most of all why I loved it was because everyday if you come back you get to open a package and then it gives you more ingredients for the slime!You should totally get this game if you love slime or if you don't have the ingredients to make slime. Also if you go to this section you can play with all sorts of amazing slime!

This is so good, Its so satisfying and the noises and looks are extremely Realistic! It's very stress relieving and so Nice to play with. You can put the vibrations on to make it feel a little bit more realistic but if you dont like the noise go to settings and turn it off (It only vibrates on supported Devices). I recommend this to people who cant make slime at home, People who like satisfying things and For people who need to get rid of stress!!

title: Super Toby Adventure üçÑclassic platform jump game
description:
üïπAbout Gameüïπ
Super Toby Adventure is a platform jumping game developed by tiptop game. 

The game combines traditional platform jumping and has a lot of modern art elements. When you play the game, you can remember the happy time


üïπGame Storyüïπüïπ
One day, Toby woke up and found that his parents were taken away by monsters, and he embarked on the road to rescue his parents.

Toby has a super athletic talent. He can jump on the high platform, step on the monster, and kill the monster with the baseball in his hand.


üåüHOW TO PLAYüåü
üïπPress Left or Right to make Toby move
üïπPress the Jump Button to make Toby jump and kill the enemies
üïπPress fire button to throws baseballs
üïπ There are more surprises hidden feature in the game waiting for you to explore


The game is made up of a number of well-made worlds, including the jungle world, the desert world, and the world of ice and snow. More world is still in production.

üëçNow, it‚Äôs time to Jump, Jump and Jump. Just Download the game and enjoy the fun of Jump

title: Super Androix
description:
Retro jump and run game with an endless supply of levels. Simple gameplay - challenging tasks. All worlds are generated randomly, you won't get the same one twice.

- 80+ randomized levels
- 8 worlds
- challenging boss fights
- increasing difficulty
- customizable gamepad & keyboard
- 8 bit retro graphics
- worldwide rankings

Tips:
Far Jump: run fast (by pressing "S" button) and move your finger over the "J" button (without leaving the screen)
If you stomp a ladybug, it will leave its shell behind. Keep "S" pressed to pick it up.
No secret pipes - don't waste your time searching.

You can change the size, position and alpha value of the touch controls or assign personal keys (only if your device has a physical keyboard).

Acceleration controls:
JUMP: touch right half of the screen
SHOOT/SPRINT: touch left half of the screen
CROUCH: swipe down (left half)


This game is powered by libgdx.

title: Super Boys - The Big Fight
description:
Super Boys has been fixed as of April 13th 2019.  Make sure you have VERSION 1.29.  If you had a device that crashed, please try again and consider re-rating the game.  Thanks. 

The year is 2019 and everyone's bored of TV, celebrities and games. Everything is inflated.

S U P E R B O Y S - The Big Fight, is an ultra violent TV show where fighters from across the globe form teams that clobber each other to win money, toasters and blu-ray players.

The overpowered Heroes and Bosses of old games are being crushed and have to team up to survive the onslaught against an enemy they cannot defeat, the new Super Boys.

Featuring characters from all of our worlds (Maximus, Toon Shooters, Blackmoor, Bearadise+) and a special appearance by... the Purple Shirted Eye Stabber from Cyanide & Happiness (explosm.net)!

Features:
‚Ä¢  53 unique playable characters (6 types, Warriors, Undead, Toons, Techs, Beasts & Wizards)
‚Ä¢  Team building, assemble your own combination of fighters compete for big prizes
‚Ä¢  20 arena maps
‚Ä¢  Ascend the Tower (of Big Dreams) , 100+ stages
‚Ä¢  Realtime PVP compete for ratings, Tag-Team or FFA (8 Player) - bash your friends up
‚Ä¢  Ladder PVP compete for weekly prizes
‚Ä¢  Cross platform (Android & iOS) & Cloud saving
‚Ä¢  Incredible face smash bros music by Matthew Pablo 

Recommended
‚Ä¢  Galaxy S4 and above

Class Strength vs Weak:

Warrior > Beast > Wizard > Tech > Toon > Undead > (warrior, repeat)

This game does contain a few in-apps, but all content is unlockable through gameplay, just like our other games!

Follow us on social media :)

http://www.facebook.com/mooffgames
http://www.mooffgames.com
http://www.twitter.com/mooffgames

Matthew Pablo is an incredible composer that we had the pleasure to work with.  If you want to hear more passionate pieces go check out his site, and even drop him a line.. he's cool dude
http://www.matthewpablo.com

Smash Club is now available for all compatible devices, lots of 3D Super Boys to be found

title: Super Toolbox - Free Boost & Clean, Power Saving
description:
Super Toolbox is designed to clean junk files, release memory, save power and manage files.

Features (FREE):
‚ñ∫Memory Clean
Release unnecessary memory with one tap to speed up your phone. The feature is designed to automatically close background apps on a regular basis to keep your phone at best performance.

‚ñ∫Junk Clean
Clean all kinds of junk files on your phone such as processes, cache, temporary files, remained files after un-installation, empty files, clipboard records and large files. 

‚ñ∫WiFi Detection
Detect your WiFi status to ensure online security. Detect and stop risky public WiFi or phishing hotspot to protect your personal privacy and property. Identify and stop apps attempting to connect to Internet in the background

‚ñ∫Power Saver
Detect power status in real time and show you the remaining usage time. Multiple built-in power-saving modes for your selection to extend stand-by time.

‚ñ∫File Manager
The feature enables you to manage filed stored on external SD card by categories or directories, so you can find out the files that take up the most space and delete them for more free space.

comments: This game has become expensive. The items that you can buy to help waiting time like the radio, apron or air conditioner, etc don't work anymore. They used to give you level 1 product like popcorn to make customers wait but now you have to buy it. You have to spend money to be competitive in this game since it's hard to earn money. The levels have become more difficult so you have to pay more to win a level. They also have a monthly $5 club to get a discount on items. The greed ruined this game

I have been playing for over a year now and it just gets better and better. I am now on level 1575 with 3 stars on every level and I have never got this far in a cooking game before as most of them became unplayable after the first few hundred levels. The recent upgrades have massively improved the game and the rewards are top notch. This is quite simply the best cooking game on Android. It is challenging, sometimes frustrating but always rewarding & Chef Club is well worth the small monthly fee

I've been playing this game for awhile now and I'm on level 1975, it's not easy to reach this level without buying things so with that being said it's no way myself or anyone else that plays this game has to wait around for more levels, this has been happening far to long and I don't understand what is so hard to keep the levels going continuously like all other games....it's not like this game is brand new, maybe new ppl should be brought in with new ideas and pls do a soul food level

I love this game compare to other games. They give you a lot more ways to play the game a lot longer. It's fun, additive and it's not like other games that as you play You have to wait 30 days for them to upgrades the game.

I played the game until level 589 spending my own money on dollars and upgrades along the way. Also, my harvest was at 150. I logged into Facebook and now everything that I spent money on is gone. I would either like all my money back or the issue fixed. Thanks!

comments: Uninstalling this biased garbage. This game eventually stacks the odds against you which is very aggravating. What's worse is the new pitcher's pickoff. It is a HUGE unfair advantage. I just got picked off 3 times in a qualifying game and my same pitcher never used his pick off. Besides that, the other team got awarded 2 bases loaded oppotunities right away and multiple HR walks repeatedly. I never had a fighting chance. How fair is that?? I'm done.

Played for about a month and then after I spent money... They decided to give me an update that won't let the app go past the opening screen. If they can fix this it's an awesome game otherwise don't bother it's will just end up permanently crashing on you..... I have had this up for a month and had no response.... Don't buy this app!! If you do don't spend money!!!!!!! Still hasn't reached out or fixed problem... And it's almost a month since my last edit...

I put a lot of time into this game, place first in the weekly standing..... and it glitches out and doesn't give me my reward. It has happened more than once. So, when i leave and come back in, the game works fine, but i cant look at last weeks standings, or collect last weeks reward. This has happened more than once. It is a shame because i actually really like this game. Would give it 5 stars if this could be resolved. Im sick of putting in this much time and effort for no reward.

The game is definitely fun and I highly enjoy it and the card aspect. The only thing keeping me from giving this app 5 stars is you never actually match up against a real person. It's always the AI using an actual person's team. This includes during events and in your league not just matchups. My buddy and I have played this for a while and even though we have ended up seeing each other in the same league or played against the others team it's never actually us. Once it's real people its 5 stars

Could be fun if it wasn't so difficult they make it impossible to win,you think your playing actual ppl but I really don't think so the opposite team is always better by a huge margin so the tournaments are rigged it takes forever to upgrade a player if you dont spend $.could be a real fun game if it was more balanced.

title: Super Jungle World - Super World 2019
description:
Super Jungle World - Super World 2019

Super Jungle World - Super World is the most intresting Adventure game with an Arcade Game Style.
Super Jungle World is a Classic Retro Platform Game with a Super Jungle Boy Character.
In the jungle adventure world you must fight the enemies  and monsters and run over obstacles, Jungle World includes a multitude of power-ups and items that gives you special powers and a lot of advantages which will help Sboy to transform of hit best mode the super boy in order to finish and beat the Bosses.
Enjoy this brand new Super Jungle World platformer game

How to Play:

> To move click on right or left on the control pad
> Press Jump-button AND right or left for running
> Press B-button to make Super Boy jump
> Click the down button to get it on some tree stumps in order to go to a bonus level!
> Swimming: press A-Button multiple times to swim higher

Best Features:

> Addictive game-play
> Amazing graphics
> Jump on the top of enemy to defeat them
> 80 lchallenging levels
> Lots of Challenging Levels
> Beautiful graphics and music
> Highest Score Records
> Classic platform game style
> Fun and suitable for all ages
> Smooth game play and easy to play
> Hidden bonus bricks and blocks
> 4 Beautiful world themes

Super Jungle World - Super World is the newest adventure game and the most interesting> Playing it, will bring your childhood memories back with old school gameplay.

This is a classic side-scrolling Game and you will be addicted to the jungle adventures it offers.

Super Jungle World - Super World give you the ability to get power ups, levels, and every other thing on the game for free. Download right now and enjoy a totally free game.

Thank you for playing!
Have fun!

comments: Surprisingly my favorite of all the games in this genre. It isn't super fancy visually or anything but it's challenging in a way that makes me think and use my brain like a puzzle more than the other games. Not really much luck involved - mostly skill in moving things around to clear the level. I've been playing for a couple of years and never get bored. Every level is creative and new and gets the wheels turning.

Love the new game design! The prizes are great! Keep the levels coming! . So adictive!!!.. This game takes away stress ! Great levels ! what else can I say. Love the prizes! Love the graphics! The excitement continues! The different levels are great! Awesome! It's been very intense but fun ! Levels are becoming harder but challenging.Best game ever!

Disappointed that game doesn't offer more rewards or the opportunity to earn random hrs of unlimited life in order to encourage more playing time & exciting rewards & earnible playing options as game is loosing it's flare & the ability to be able to keep drawing me back in & encourage more playing time so it doesn't get deleted for the new game in ads that replaced it because they offered more playing time encouragement

Really addictive game ! Great to spend some time! Still some hick-ups with some features and internet connectivity but all in all a good fun! The last release has a bug with any action related to bonus moves or features - doesn't recognized internet connectivity and therefore doesn't allow to watch any advertisements for bonus moves - would be great if you guys could fix it! Thanks

It was a five-star game at the lower levels, but in the 800-vicinity became annoying when stuck on one level for way too long. The 900-series levels offered a few more aids, which is how I made it to level 1000. Definitely one for deletion once the boosters are spent.

title: Pixel Super Heroes
description:
Do you ever have a dream to become a Super Heroes?! Now this is your chance to achieve your dream and prove your skill to become the next Super Heroes!

Now the world is threatened by a new enemy and good people are taken as hostage. We must find all the Super Heroes again and save the world. All Heroes will have to run across the city, fight the evil new enemy and free the hostages.

Pixel Super Heroes is a very addictive and most thrilling Super Heroes Action Running Game where you must collect coin as much as possible and also save the hostage. Now it's a time to become the next Super Heroes!

Test your reflexes as your Super Heroes will race down the city, touch the screen to jump, smash enemy, collect coin, unlock new Heroes, and see how far you can run!

‚úßAwesome Pixel Art Super Heroes‚úß
Get many Super Heroes to accompany you in your interesting and thrilling running game! Collect all of Super Heroes and Save all the hostages by using your favorite Super Heroes. You will also get a different city if you play with different Super Heroes.

‚úßCollect Coin‚úß
Collect as many coins when you running and use it to recruit your favorite Super Heroes.

‚úßSave the Hostage‚úß
This is what it mean to be a Super Heroes! Face the evil and Save all the hostages.

‚úßOffline Mode & Online Mode‚úß
Don't have internet connection? No Problem! You can play Pixel Super Heroes anywhere, anyplace and anytime!

‚úßEasy to Play‚úß
Tap the screen to make the hero jump from platform to platform, make sure you must avoid attacks from enemy. Good luck  ï‚Ä¢ÃÄœâ‚Ä¢ÃÅ î

‚úßChallenge Mode‚úß
Complete all CHALLENGE and get the reward!

‚úßSpecial Power Up ‚úß
Get the Special Power Up when you run and feel the greatness of Super Heroes Power.
Each power up  are different and has an unique power.  Make sure you can get this power and use it to become Super Heroes!

So, what are you waiting for? Save the world with your Super Heroes Powers

Pixel Super Heroes is free to download and play. However, some game items can also be purchased for real money. A network connection is required during purchase game items.

Join the community at
Facebook - https://www.facebook.com/PixelSuperHeroes

Have any trouble and need our support? Contact our support at http://support.lytogame.com

comments: The game is pretty good.the reason I did 4 instead of 5 was because you can't use the characters you rescue,and I'm not mad it's just I don't see the point of getting new characters because they do the same thing,jump,fight,jump,fight.

update: Hi guys, Found a bug, if you reach 10000m (10km) if you complete a word or get the UFO, anything that launches you high and blasts forward. The game crashes and you never come down and have to quit/retry and you lose any of the progress you made. first time was the UFO so with a black screen, this time with SUPER (20km+ before I quit).
This game is a lot of fun, and the names of the characters are really funny! I also love the random power ups
Twice this week I have reached 9000m and when I pickup a (fully upgraded) UFO powerup, the Ufo just keeps flying and never stops. That's now 20000m in total that I have lost out on.

Game is great. The only complaint I have is that the motorcycle power up, when fully upgraded, is more likely to get you killed than to help you. It would make sense if it was just temporary invincible and not going so fast you don't have time to react. Everything else is fine.

Run, jump and climb to outrun the slime! You‚Äôll face flying slimeballs, enemy creatures, disappearing blocks, and many other hazards as you try to escape. How high can you make it before the slime overtakes you?

30 PLAYABLE CHARACTERS
Play as all ten of Ben‚Äôs alien heroes, including Four Arms, Heatblast, Diamondhead, XLR8, Cannonbolt, Shock Rock, Wildvine, Grey Matter, Stinkfly, and Overflow, PLUS Omni-Enhanced and crazy costumed versions of the aliens. There‚Äôs always someone new to unlock!

title: DC Super Hero Girls Blitz
description:
Barbara Gordon here! A.k.a. the one and only Batgirl. You might know my awesome friends and me as the DC Super Hero Girls! We're not your average high school students: we also fight crime by going head-to-head with Super-Villains. Do you want to join us for some crazy fast games and challenges? Be ready to jump, dance, zip-line, and climb your way around the city as you help us earn stars that'll upgrade our super-secret hideout!

PLAY 24 SUPER-FAST GAMES
‚Ä¢ JUMP across rooftops or zip-line your way to a Super-Villain battle! 
‚Ä¢ BATTLE The Cheetah, Wonder Woman-style!
‚Ä¢ SOLVE puzzles with Bumblebee!
‚Ä¢ ROCK OUT like Supergirl!
‚Ä¢ FEED cute animals with Green Lantern!
‚Ä¢ USE magical spells like Zatanna!
‚Ä¢ BEAT your high score! Yeah!
‚Ä¢ COLLECT all the comics to unlock new games! 

MEET THE DC SUPER HERO GIRLS
‚Ä¢ BATGIRL: a technological mastermind who's also a fangirl for all things Batman! 
‚Ä¢ WONDER WOMAN: a crusader for truth and justice who courageously leads the DC Super Hero Girls! 
‚Ä¢ SUPERGIRL: a rebellious teen with a big heart and superhuman strength! 
‚Ä¢ BUMBLEBEE: a super-genius who never gives up and can also fly and shrink!
‚Ä¢ GREEN LANTERN: a compassionate peacemaker who has incredible energy superpowers!
‚Ä¢ ZATANNA: a mesmerizing magician who's charming and super confident!

DECORATE THE HIDEOUT 
‚Ä¢ EARN stars to upgrade our super-secret hideout with cool decorations!
‚Ä¢ COLLECT outfits and dress up the whole crew!

PRIVACY & ADVERTISING
Budge Studios takes children's privacy seriously and ensures that its apps are compliant with privacy laws. This application has received the ‚ÄúESRB (Entertainment Software Rating Board) Privacy Certified Kids‚Äô Privacy Seal‚Äù. For more information, please visit our privacy policy at: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal/privacy-policy/, or email our Data Protection Officer at: privacy@budgestudios.ca

Before you download this app, please note that it is free to try, but some content may only be available via in-app purchases. In-app purchases cost real money and are charged to your account. To disable or adjust the ability to make in-app purchases, change your device settings. This app may contain contextual advertising (including the option to watch ads for rewards) from Budge Studios regarding other apps we publish, from our partners and from third parties. Budge Studios does not permit behavioral advertising or retargeting in this app. The app may also contain social media links that are only accessible behind a parental gate.

END-USER LICENSE AGREEMENT
This application is subject to an End-User License Agreement available through the following link: https://budgestudios.com/en/legal-embed/eula/

ABOUT BUDGE STUDIOS
Budge Studios was founded in 2010 with the mission to entertain and educate children around the world, through innovation, creativity and fun. Its high-quality app portfolio consists of original and branded properties. Budge Studios maintains the highest standards of safety and age-appropriateness, and has become a global leader in children‚Äôs apps for smartphones and tablets.

title: Super Adventure : Jungle Adventures
description:
Super Adventure : Jungle Adventures is classic retro platform game style. This game bring back memories of old school arcade games with numerous adventure. World of this game contains well designed levels, various enemies, bosses, simple gameplay, nice graphics and soothing music and sounds.

On beautiful sunny day Ted  and his girlfriend were eating apples together and enjoying life and suddenly "Evil Dinosaur Monster" appeared from deep jungle out of no where. That evil moster captured Ted's girlfriend and ran away in deep jungle world. Ted is on Super Adventure to rescue his girlfriend by defeating Dinosaur Monster and teach him a lesson.

To bring Ted's girlfriend back he needs your help. Run and jump through the deep jungle adventures, avoid traps, clear all enemies in your way and defeat all bosses. Super Adventure : Jungle Adventures will give you classic feel throughout the game with side scrolling view.

Super Adventures : Jungle Adventures Features:
+ Beautiful high-resolution graphics 
+ Awesome gameplay similar to retro classic game
+ Easy and intuitive controls with on-screen retro controller
+ Hidden bonus bricks and blocks with strawberry, flower and shield
+ Destroyable bricks, blocks and moving platform
+ Hidden bonus levels with lots of classic and modern coins
+ Additional collectibles, coins, shields and more
+7 beautiful worlds with 140 well designed levels
+ Underground and water worlds, swim, jump and run
+ Over 20 enemies and obstacles
+ 12 boss fights: angry scorpio, spider, big bee and golem
+ Store with additional items and rewards: unlock worlds before finish other worlds
+ Unlock free coins, buy items to make mike and max stronger
+ Classic retro platform game style
+ Suitable for all ages

How to play Super Adventures : Jungle Adventure :
+ Eat mushroom and flower to become stronger and defeat all monsters.
+ Tap Left / Right to move.
+ Jump to crash the enemy.
+ Eat flower to shoot enemy.
+ Collect all coins and bonus items to get more points and buy additional items in store.

Download Super Adventures : Jungle Adventures now! It is a fun game super adventures for every one!
Enjoy your childhood memories now!

To bring Ted's girlfriend back he needs your help. Run and jump through the deep jungle adventures, avoid traps, clear all enemies in your way and defeat all bosses. Super Adventure : Jungle Adventures will give you classic feel throughout the game with side scrolling view.

Super Adventures : Jungle Adventures Features:
+ Beautiful high-resolution graphics
+ Awesome gameplay similar to retro classic game
+ Easy and intuitive controls with on-screen retro controller
+ Hidden bonus bricks and blocks with strawberry, flower and shield
+ Destroyable bricks, blocks and moving platform
+ Hidden bonus levels with lots of classic and modern coins
+ Additional collectibles, coins, shields and more
+7 beautiful worlds with 140 well designed levels
+ Underground and water worlds, swim, jump and run
+ Over 20 enemies and obstacles
+ 12 boss fights: angry scorpio, spider, big bee and golem
+ Store with additional items and rewards: unlock worlds before finish other worlds
+ Unlock free coins, buy items to make mike and max stronger
+ Classic retro platform game style
+ Suitable for all ages

How to play Super Adventures : Jungle Adventure :
+ Eat mushroom and flower to become stronger and defeat all monsters.
+ Tap Left / Right to move.
+ Jump to crash the enemy.
+ Eat flower to shoot enemy.
+ Collect all coins and bonus items to get more points and buy additional items in store.

Download Super Adventures : Jungle Adventures now! It is a fun game super adventures for every one!
Enjoy your childhood memories now!
summary: Super Adventure is classic game bring to your childhood memories.

comments: I used the junk-cleaner feature and all my photos saved on my device was wiped out. Although it was partially my fault but it never gave a warning on what will the app do to things. Too frequent ads too.. The app was good and probably worthy of 4-5 stars but due to my experience i was disappointed.

I don't like having to unlock my phone after I unlock my phone from the lock screen. so I try to call someone touch the phone app have to unlock of the home screen, then touch the name I'm calling have to unlock it of the contact screen, and again push send unlock the screen. All that just to call or text someone use an app. What if I needed to call 911?

Quite simply the best Anti Virus App going. 100% recommended and also for professional use. We use it to safeguard all our warehouse phones. Never let us down yet. Amazing piece of essential software.

This app was ok for a while, but then it keeds getting stuck when I apply my security code to enter in my locked apps. I have to constantly restart my phone. Fix this problem and I'll rate your app 4star or better...

After trying multiple antivirus apps, I found this some time ago. It has offered a number of handy features such as a memory-booster, junk-cleaner, and wi-fi scanner. The one notable flaw is that it has seemed to delete my spreadsheet when I have stored it in my "documents" folder. I found a way around this by storing it outside of the folder, but a high-quality app would never allow such an issue in the first place to be honest. Recently, I unintentionally opened a link that led to a message claiming my device had been infected by viruses. Neither this app nor Malwarebytes detected anything, so I sincerely hope it was nothing more than a lie. If so, then I sincerely hope this app allows adequate protection to keep my device safe and prevent infection or spread of any threats. As long as this is accomplished, this app can be considered at least decent.

comments: Very intresting game.. It's very nice game of adventure ..
Very funny and easy control
It is interesting, but stops suddenly in the middle of the game ..and it happens repeatedly..please fix the problem if possible.

It's a fun game but I'm debating if I want to uninstall. Level 28 is impossible to beat. I wish you could watch a video in order to skip it or pay a small fee to skip it. I can't get pass that level and it's very frustrating to keep playing over and over again.

The Jabber series continues with another delightful game reminiscent of the Super Mario Bros classics. Good graphics, fun gameplay, good button placement, excellent colors, upgradable powerups, and more! Running out of lives does not send you back to the beginning of the world or game, but from the start of the level, as there are checkpoints throughout the level. Increasing challenges as you progress lets you really test your mettle. I'm a big fan of this series, and I know you will be too!

title: Super Hero Fighting Incredible Crime Battle
description:
Let's play the most exhilarating and electrifying game of the season. Indulge yourself with dangerous and deadly quest against terrorist, gangster and shadow mafia robbers in super hero. Its an action and fun packed game. If you are looking for something new and astonishing game play, It's a right place for you. It's a time to become real war hero. Are you ready to show your surprise attacks with sneaky tricks against your ultimate rivals mafia agents. It's time to be real super hero.

Crime rate is growing in the city and the situation is totally off the control for the Metropolitan Police. This time your city will become a war-head zone. Don‚Äôt let the underworld killers rule the streets. Being a super hero, its your turn to show all your epic power and marvelous strategy to protect the people and whole world. Use incredible fighting skills and precise shooting proficiency to eliminate crime battle. And become the most courageous and fearless war hero.

To rescue the injured citizens from the city crime battle and fight with gangsters is not an easy duty. Answer the call of the injured & rescue them! They call to you because they believe in your mutant super hero strange powers & they know you will do anything to perform your duty. They look up to you as their super hero. Only you can help the military army save your country & city so help them whole heatedly to win this crime battle against the enemy terrorist forces, crime gangster & with the help of your super hero mutant strange super power rescue every injured from the frontline.

Life of an amazing super hero flying from one building to another, rescue civilians and fighting with crime and winning the city battle ,is a true hero thriller. The flying super simulator gives you a complete action experience of city battle unseen in some strange hero games. Transform into super flying legend and Show the villains and mafia who's a superhero.

Begin a desperate survival mission to stand among the living in this bold adventure survival game. Save the humans on earth in the art of rescue. title: Super Drop Land
description:
Drop into a simple and fun adventure!

Fall, chase and flip your way down to victory. Chase rabbits, catch puppies and run from spooky ghosts!

Super Drop Land is a two directional platformer where you collect, chase and run your way down through each land.
- Play through 10 different lands with different twists and themes. 
- Unlock and wear different hats to dramatically change the game, including the multiplayer racing crown.
- Unlock and complete over 15 different hand crafted puzzles each exploring and teaching a different mechanic.

comments: After getting the last hat (which was a retro filter hat) the game completly crashed. Now I can't even play the game anymore. When I start the game, the blue loading screen appears and the white loading circle keeps spinning and that's it. The game just gets stuck on this bule loading screen and nothing happens. This is really frustrating because I got all the hats and then the game crashed.

It's really cool and I love it with all my heart, but I think you should add a thing where you can pick your own colours for skins ( you'd have to pay coins obviously. ) You don't have to add it, I was just suggesting. Great app! üòÑüòÑ

Nice game but gets boring extremely quickly. When you launch the game for the first time, you get put into a non-skipable tutorial with a few non-dismissable text boxes to read. What I didn't realize was that for this tutorial to properly end, you need to die because only then does it send you to the actual hub area and give you a tutorial on that. However, because the game is so easy I never died the first time I played, making the tutorial unbeatable. (It also restarts when you quit the app)

i stumbled upon this AMAZING game. super drop land very quickly rose to be one of my favorite games to play on my phone. the simple yet challenging levels and inner sub levels within the game keep you on your toes all the way down! I'm a big fan of the side puzzles, still early in the process and I'm already loving them. I love the credits and overall great job everybody!

fun endless vertical drop game. Ultra simple control schemes but it was recommended that you must tap rather than swiping it. score attack races it's pretty fun but later down the road it just becomes something else. watching commercials Awards you double XP but it was randomized is it a Facebook is my one of my biggest Kryptonite along with Twitter. title: Super Backup Pro: SMS&Contacts
description:
The fastest data backup tool on android!
You can backup Apps & Contacts & SMS & Call logs & Bookmarks & Calendars to the SD card/Gmail.You will never lose your data again!
This is the Ads free version of Super Backup

Dark Theme will come back soon!!!

‚òÖImportant Notice #1
If your phone has inbuilt storage, the default backup location will probably be the internal storage card and not the external. 
This is because the phone reports the storage that way. 
If you intend to do a factory reset on the phone, please make sure default backup folder is in your external SD card before doing it. If not, please copy the entire backup folder ("SmsContactsBackup" by default)to your external SD card 

‚òÖImportant Notice #2
Since Android M, access bookmarks from 3rd application is disabled, so Super Backup can not backup and restore bookmarks.

Features:
-Backup apps to SD card
-Backup all app download links of Google Play

recentChanges: Fix bug: Google Drive connection failed
comments: When I first got this I gave it five stars.. Until I really needed it. I have now spent two days trying to find the latest automatic upload to google drive. The way the files are named it is difficult to discern the date unless you are able to view the entire file name. There is no auto search feature to find the latest one, but the thing that really kills this app is you can not install a back over existing files, o if your phone was stolen and you get it back after a couple months, you can't just load the backup on top of the last few months. VERY short sighted. Also, the auto save function apparently just quit, unless you happen to check up on all your apps you would never know, and then you are the one who has lost three thousand business contacts. There is no app support for this product.

******************************************************************* The past 2 updates since V2.2.56 seem to have broken the automatic APK backup feature. I reinstalled V2.2.56 and automatic backup works fine with it. Version 2.2.80 is still not automatically backing up APK installs. I still have to revert back to 2.2.56. There have been at least 3-4 updates of this app by the author since the last version that worked automatically (v2.2.56). None of those updates have fixed the issue on my Moto Z3 phone running Android 9. I have also never seen any response to my posted comments about this issue, or to any of the same comments posted by other users. I would be nice if the author acknowledged the issue, and if he could say if it's something that he is fixing or not. My rating of the app continues to drop. Eventually I will give up on V2.2.56 and look for some other new app that does the automatic backup right. *******************************************************************

*** UPDATED *** üëçüèº I'm so glad I paid for the full version, this app does almost everything I need it to so it's worth it. A feature i hope the developers could add in the future is music playlist back up, to either .txt or .m3u formats. Until then, 4 Stars ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ‚òÖ
Premium mebmer not update call recording....3rd class and Ghatia app. Not update super backup feature to pro version premium

Auto Backup Apps after installing a new app no longer works. This part of the application is broken even though I selected it in the app settings. To troubleshoot, I've tried clearing the cache and reinstalling the app with a fresh copy from the play store. Still doesn't work. It looks as if the developer has stopped releasing new updates for this app. So sad! My device is a Galaxy S10 Plus with Android v10.0 (not rooted) with 67 GB of space free on the phone.

title: Super Cat Bros
description:
Six cats are the new Jump'n'Fur stars!
 
Reunite Alex the Cat with his siblings and explore a mysterious island. 
 
Control 24 paws with just 2 thumbs tapping the left or right side of the screen. You'll be surprised how easy it is to climb, swim, jump and run. Just don't forget to bring the right cat for the job!
 
Super Cat Bros is tailor made for the touch screen. It has never been so easy and satisfying to play platformers on your phone.
 
Download now to open the kitty door for the Super Cat Bros and meow away a boring day.

One of the cutest tales about cats on Google Play. 
 
+ six cats with unique abilities
+ simple yet rewarding controls
+ more than 50 fun levels to enjoy
+ cute pixel visuals
+ lots of hidden secrets
+ achievements and leaderboards

recentChanges: Minor Bug Fixes
comments: Been playing a little over a year+ and I've enjoyed it thus far. Not to difficult but not too easy. Ad placement is a bit funky at times but aren't too disruptive. The limited lives aren't too bad only once ran out for to a bad luck streak, but it's not punishing. Used Google rewards to pay for the ad removal and it's not expensive, $1.99 got no ads. Overall I'd recommend it for anyone who likes old nes games with a snes look. Control is easy to pick up on as well. 4 out of 5 for the game.

I first played this game many years ago, searching through the app store for something to play (and probably some emulated Mario Bros.). I ended up finding this game, and absolutely enjoyed it. It is rather beautiful graphically, and the controls and gameplay are simple, yet still enjoyable. It is a simple, fun, little sidescrolling platformer with cats. And that, is good.

Exactly what the mobile game market needs at the moment, just a charming jem and i thank anyone who made this, the music is amazing and while the art can be so so at points its still really good. The level design is just like the artwork if not a little bit worse being more average than insipred but dont get me wrong the game is still fun, fun enough that im rating it based off of console/nintendo standards. I would definitely reccomend this to anyone that likes the mobile market.

I loved this game, and Super Cat Tales 2, but my one complaint is how on my new phone, the screen is zoomed in for this one app. I've tried troubleshooting, but I couldnt figure anything out. Instead of hating this app for its flaw, I'm respectfully requesting that the creators fix this issue. Other than that one problem, the game is pretty enjoyable, the graphics are nice, the characters are cute. The overall appearance of the game is down right charming.

I'm only 11, so i can't make a very good observation, but this app is amazing. The music is poppin , the cats, caracters, controls, puzzles, and levels are all amazing! I give it a 4 star because first off, they basically want us to do a full completion run for the bells needed to pass. But it isn't a pay to win, and it keeps you busy! On top of that, its world layout is amazing too! The games animations are amazing, and gosh i wrote too much. I reccomend it to anyone who is in need of a uplift.

title: Super PI
description:
This application is android version of Super PI which is used  to test the performance and stability of your android device, by calculating œÄ to a specified number of digits after the decimal point.

Features:

* Calculate Pi using FFT and AGM, fast and reliable algorithm.
* Optimize for most ABI(Application Binary Interface) including armeabi, armeabi-v7a, mips and x86.
* Support pre-defined typical digits up to 4 million.
* Easily share your results to friends by single click.

Here is the result from my Galaxy Nexus, for your reference:

====CPU Information====
Device Model: Galaxy Nexus
CPU Type: ARMv7 Processor rev 10 (v7l)
CPU Frequency: 1200MHz
Number of Processor: 2

====Pi Computation Result====
8K digits: 0.083 seconds
16K digits: 0.175 seconds
32K digits: 0.311 seconds
128K digits: 1.671 seconds
512K digits: 9.787 seconds
1M digits: 24.251 seconds
2M digits: 55.583 seconds
4M digits: 130.073 seconds

If you have any comment, please send to support@rhmsoft.com, thanks.

Collect exotic flora and customise your very own space aquarium. Watch your Starplants grow as you create a home for your wondrous collection of Starfish.

comments: Absolutely love this game and it really passes the time! I only wish there were more options as far as levels, missions, and different maps to play on... Different experiences for each fish you use. Playing the same map over and over gets a little boring but would be an easy fix. Just add a few different worlds, planets, views. Add see stuff. Otherwise, I love this game! I hope it continues to improve and I hope it doesn't get boring for me. I hope they can keep up & keep it entertaining.

It's pretty good. But during some parts of the game, there is obvious errors and "coding" I guess that's pretty noticeable that goes against the user. Example, when dodging the planets or items, numerous times I have had my fish die when nowhere close to an object just based on how far I got. And when playing the prize volcano, when your fish gets to the end, I have had it very obviously curve to avoid getting a new fish or plant. Might need to fix that. But it's ok.

I really like the game's concept and the fact that the gameplay is so laidback. It's a huge bonus that in-game currency is realistically obtained without necessarily using any real money, unless you're too impatient to collect dropped currency. Even the higher currency (Aka the one you usually will have to buy) is obtainable by doing daily missions. The only setback for me is the limited amount of fish and zones, and even then there are plenty to find. I've just collected them too quickly üòÇ

This is the cutest game ever!!! üòçü•∞ It is so sweet the whole theme of it, galaxy and star-fish as they call it, the graphics are superb, really smooth and beautiful, everything has a bit of magic to it, and it's done SO WELL!!! From the beautiful imagination of the star-fish to the cutest little noises that the star plans make. It's so engaging, the fish are the cutest ever, and great game!! Everything has thoroughly been thought through and the experience is just super enjoyable and fun!!

This is a fun and relaxing game overall. I love the music and the sound effects, and I especially love the art of the game. I do have some minor annoyances, that if fixed can improve the gameplay. So the quests, they progressively get harder, but you get the same amount of gems as the trailer easier quests. This is quite annoying, especially since the quests are harder but less rewarding if you do them. Also, the ads are louder then the game. They blare through my headphones

title: Super Pixel Mega Jump Run
description:
Enjoy the nostalgic game 80‚Äôs run and jump style. It leads you to get back to the sweet memory of multilevel jumping game that once was your favorite. Jumpman Adventure will take you to conquer the adventure world of Jumpman.  Challenge the fight with the big boss of the levels. You will power up with special free items to make you run faster or have special skill for beating the bosses. 

The game comes with smooth graphic and beautiful background music. Its tone and feel are from the good old days of 80‚Äôs console game or game boy. Now you can have a happy time like those days on your mobile devices and have a big adventure though the world of Jumpman.  It‚Äôs easy to play and best for everyone from kids to adults.  This game is multilevel super adventure retro game and you will be exciting in each scene change and the toughness of the big bosses. 

You can earn free coins by watching video ads and use the coins to exchange the special items such as lives, wings, key, stage unlocker, fireball, etc.  For the better experience in game play, you can buy them from the game shop too. 

You will have the best time while traveling with Jumpman Adventure. It‚Äôs good for your spare time and you can play it anywhere at any time as you like. Have fun. It‚Äôs free to play. 

Features:
-          Adventure world of Jumpman that you have to unlock the hard stage
-          Multi-level game with different bosses
-          Free special items in game to boost up your abilities and power
-          Special items in shop for your better experience such as extra lives, fireball to fight the bosses, wings to fly for faster moving.
 
How to play:
- Use the control button to control the character direction.
- Choose the moving type to match the scenario 
- You have three lives by default. Keep it best.
- Try to unlock the hard stage.

title: Police Super Car Driving
description:
Police Super Car Driving is a open world police car driving simulator game where you have total freedom to the open road. 
Drive to top speeds, drift around corners, cause mayhem smash into destructible objects, and jump off the crazy stunts in super fast police cars, 

!!AVAILABLE NOW, FOR FREE!!

With the latest in driving simulation, put your driver skills to the test and show everyone the tricks to being the best police driver officer. Go fast and with no limits to the fun, drive from a garage full of powerful police cars, from interceptors to cruisers, patrol vehicles to 4x4 police jeeps, the most extreme stunts in the world are waiting for you! Drive, boost, drift, roll, jump, and crash your police car in our all new extreme police driver's paradise!

GAME FEATURES

- Dynamic camera angles, witness your amazing stunts from multiple views!
- The best car driving physics
- huge open world environment
- Interact with real world objects and surfaces, crash through billboards!
- Realistic vehicle damage, every hit and scrape shown with each collision 
- Authentic police car lights and sounds 
- Huge selection of high quality police vehicles, all modeled off real sports cars!
- Easy to use driving controls, both touch and tilt controls!

title: Super Screen Recorder‚ÄìNo Root REC & Screenshot
description:
Super Screen Recorder is one of the best professional screen recorder & screenshot apps. All FREE, NO root required, NO time limit, NO watermark.

In this user-friendly app, you can use the excellent video editing features to make the beautiful Full HD videos, and all the features are FREE.

‚òÖ Full HD Screen Recording
- Highest Quality supplied: 1080P, 12Mbps, 60FPS
- Many resolutions, frame rates, and bit rates available
- Pause / resume screen recording through floating window or notification bar
- Shake phone to stop recording and hide floating window
- Record long time videos with SD card (External Memory)
- Facecam Recorder, enable front camera to capture your reactions while screen recording, very useful for game recorder
- Support portrait, landscape and auto screen record mode
- Show touches: display click operations in the screen recording
- Watermark: show your brand, default is off

‚òÖ Brush Tool
- Touch screen to draw: you can draw a symbol or marks on the screen when recording or screenshot

‚òÖ Video Editor
- Video Cut / Trim: Remove any part of videos freely 
- Merge videos: Combine multiple videos into one
- Add background music from you device to make a personalized video
- Compress video: Easier to share with friends
- Video Rotate

‚òÖ GIF Maker
- Convert your favorite part of the recorded video into animated GIF file, and share your GIF by one click


Tips:
To prevent screen recording interruption, we suggest you freeze some big apps in the background process and authorize the super screen recorder to obtain the permission ‚ÄùWhitelist‚Äù. title: Super Smash Amino
description:
Super Smash Amino is the fastest growing mobile social network for Super Smash Bros.

- Build a profile showing your passion for Super Smash Bros.
- Connect with other Super Smash Bros. players around the world
- Discuss your favorite games, platforms, characters, and strategy
- Gain a massive following by sharing your thoughts, finds, and creations

In Super Smash Amino, you can:

- Create polls and discussions to share with other Super Smash Bros. players
- Show off your latest achievements
- Share, discuss, and debate games, characters, and strategy
- Obsess over the latest news in the world of Super Smash Bros
