You have to be more precise and more in the shadows rather than being able to stand out and express yourself the way you used to. Everything you do and say is monitored.

I like this app but the thing is it's grain really stopped the sound was stopped working for me like the mics for people but I guess you're everything else but the mics I can't hear from people so I uninstalled it and reinstalling it so I'm going to see if that helps it or not

People are really nice, they understand, they help and they teach you how to do your best in the game. Curators and Leaders are the best, there's always something to do there. Best Amino ever! 4 stars, cause it's still Amino, an app with a dog team instead of humans. They casually ban people tho, watch out! ~Peachy

awesome (doing this for emojis) okay on a serious note, the app in general is pretty good. My biggest problem is the people that use it. I have found some really cool smash players that use this app, but the other people that use this app are children mostly or people who act like children. If you don't want to be in a community with a bunch of pretentious 13 year olds who scream into their mics and insult people when they feel insecure, then this app isn't for you.
I love it I can falk to other people who like playing Smash bros as well.

title: SUPER PADS - Become a DJ!
description:
Super Pads is a free easy-to-use DJ app. You can play famous songs, create your own music and feel like a real beat maker. It works like a launchpad, but there are hundreds of kits predefined, with amazing beats and loops. You can also import sounds and create your own music like a professional DJ. Perform your beats and save them with the audio recorder tool. Make music in a fun way! 

ON SUPER PADS ANY TRACK IS FREE! 

With Super Pads you will be able to play all the hits that are out now. This music maker has more than 800 DJ kits available, each one inspired by a famous song. Every week you can get new tracks, beats and loops in many music styles:
- EDM
- Trap
- Dubstep
- Rap
- Hip Hop
- Pop
- K-pop
- Reggaeton 
- Remixes of games themes, memes and much more, to please any beat maker!

FEATURES:
- Hundreds of kits inspired by known music
- New tracks, beats and loops every week
- In-app tutorial and YouTube videos
- Create music tool (you can create and share sounds with others)
- Audio recorder
- High quality sounds
- sound packs with 12 or 24 pads
- Predefined beats and loops 
- Edit kit tool
- Multitouch
- No need to update to get new tracks 

EASY-TO-USE MUSIC MAKER:
You don't have to be a professional DJ to use Super Pads - anyone can become a beat maker with this app. The kits are inspired by famous tracks, with predefined beats and loops. Play famous hits, like Faded and Alone from DJ Alan Walker, besides DJ Martin Garrix, Marshmello and others.

AUDIO RECORDER:
Perform your beats and save the audio with the record tool. Before playing, click to the record button and click again when you're done. Then edit your music file and save it! 

EVERY MUSIC STYLE:
Super Pads has kits inspired by many styles like electro, edm, dubstep, hip hop, rap, pop, rock, reggaeton and even k-pop (yes, you can find BTS and even BLACKPINK in the app). You can also send us music suggestions, we make music every week based in what you want to play!

Anyone who loves music can play Super Pads, from the beginner to the professionals! If you want to become a DJ, this is a great start!

Who create our beats?

We have an awesome beat maker team around here, creating everything from scratch! We don't use the original songs, we make everything in our own studio. Each kit is inspired by a famous song, but the beats and loops are made by some DJ from our team. So feel free to use our sounds in your compositions :)


BECOME A SUPERPADDER:
Subscribe to our YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/superpads
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/superpadsapp/

Do you wanna talk to us? -> hello@opalastudios.com

‚òÖ

comments: The game was fine at first... very exited to download this to my new phone... I may have found a bug. You see... I can't download any new songs, it just bothers me the fact that I'm connected on internet (which surely could've worked). I think that something's wrong... so please fix this issue! I really wanted this so badly! (Yeah sure... you upgraded this to look more nice but you clearly didn't fix the bug that have been in the game years ago!)

It was great when I used my phone. They listen to fan suggestions, the songs are easy to play, and you can make your own kits. But after installing it on my tablet, I saw a major downgrade. Whenever I play a song on my tablet, the speakers make a crackling the whole time. I tried using earbuds, but the crackling still happened. Neither are damaged, but I'm a little disappointed. Edit: After the new update, the problem still exists. But I will have patience in Opala!

I first used the app in 2018 on my mom's phone. I now use it again because it is a great music app. But I noticed that the desing of the app has changed a lot. But I wish I was excited to see that but no. The new desing is not cooler. It was cooler with the previous desing. But it is a great app. I found no bugs because in the past there were a lot. But still like the app.‚ò∫

I use it mainly for the coupons availables only through this app. Otherwise I wouldn't bother, as it is slow, needs a lot of development.

Hello, please add a button/option to add all coupons ASAP. Also consider doing a reward program just like Metro does. Merci

title: Super Pixel Heroes 2020
description:
Fight as King Kong, RoboCop, epic legends Atom, Zeus from Real Steel and The Jungle Book heroes in this Pixel smashing adventure.  Avoid countless obstacles, discover unique hero abilities, collect rare characters and go on an endless win streak to become the greatest arcade champion!

COLLECT LEGENDARY 3D HEROES
Unravel legendary heroes with super-cool abilities and exciting action moves to experience the crazy Cartoon and Comical action Heroes. Unlock exciting and funky characters like Dinosaurs, The Jungle Book heroes, Zombies, Sci-fi Real Steel Robots and more.

AMAZING ARCADE ACTION
Smash & Bash Pixels! Experience the thrill of winning fights even with Immortals and at times with only One Limb. 

UNLEASH HILARIOUS FINISHERS
Knockout Brawl challengers with hilarious finishing moves ‚Äì smash, dash, bash, and even fart - in this amazing pixel smashing game!

UNLEASH SPECIAL ABILITIES
Smash down opponents with Punch, Bleed, Critical Damage, Stun, Force Field, Obstacle Shield, Last Stand & Instant Death special abilities.

PVP and Versus Mode
Battle Royale: Last player standing wins! 

EXCITING ARENAS
Escape rolling fireballs, spiked iron and unique obstacles in retro art-style arenas - Lava River, Helipad and the Dockyard.

UNRAVEL POWERFUL CHAMPIONS 
Open Rare, Epic and Legendary crates with surprise rewards of amazing hero parts. Unleash Ultimate, incredible and Pixel Heroes in the Marvel ous Universe.  

JOIN ‚ÄòSUPER PIXEL HEROES‚Äô EXCLUSIVE FAN CLUB

Enjoy regular news on game updates, characters, features, views, video tips and more for Free

* *Permissions:
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress.
- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: For saving your game data & progress

Like us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/reliancegames
Follow us on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/reliancegames 
Watch us on youtube: http://www.youtube.com/reliancegames

*Also optimized for tablet devices

This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game items can be purchased with real money in the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store‚Äôs settings.

title: Super Dangerous Dungeons
description:
Hop into a challenging platforming adventure with the little treasure hunter Timmy! Run and jump your way through trap and puzzle filled corridors, but watch out: the rooms are full of spikes, pits, and other deadly dangers. Do you have what it takes to conquer the dangerous dungeons and reach the legendary treasure?

GAME FEATURES:
- Over 60 challenging levels, including bosses and secret stages!
- Stylish and retro pixel art graphics!
- SNES inspired retro soundtrack by KungFuFurby!
- Unlock achievements to prove your dungeon mastery!
- Time Trial mode with leaderboards for speedrunners!
descriptionHTML:

GAME FEATURES:

- Time Trial mode with leaderboards for speedrunners!
summary: Can you survive the dangerous dungeons and reach the legendary treasure?
developerAddress:
Tapulikatu 21
04200 Kerava
Finland
recentChanges: Changed jump physics back to what they were before the ice dungeon update by the request of the speedrun community.
comments: WOW! I love this game. It brought back good memories (and some frustration) from the old NES days. Fun and challenging on some levels, mainly the 4th dungeon end level. I've not played the 2 extra dungeons yet, but I can't wait. If you're looking for a good game to kill a little bit of time (beat first 4 dungeons in a couple hours of non continuous play) then I highly recommend this game!!! Been looking for a game like this for awhile, just wish it had more dungeons...

It isn't often that I find platformers of true quality on the Play Store. Super Dangerous Dungeons is on of the platformers that fits that criteria for greatness. I have a lot I could say in praising this title whether it be it's art style, controls, or level design, however I feel that a 5 star rating is enough to show how pleased I am with this game's quality. If I had to say something negative, I guess the music isn't super memorable. All n all, this is what Super Mario Run should have been.

This game is truly great. The callback to retro platformers from the 80s and 90s is done better than any other mobile platformer I've played, and although it's difficult, it's addictive and has no death penalty so I managed to complete the game even though it was very hard. My only criticism is that playing it on a tablet I had trouble with the control pad. I had to stretch my thumb quite far. I recommend this game to anybody who likes platformers.

Good game, but with lots of VERY IRRITATING PARTS where the game keep sending you all the way back to the start of a long stage every time you die!! And you keep dying a lot because theres a lot of very precise jumps needed! Very very annoying!!!!
This is a spectacularly fun game! Great art and music. And challenging levels. This game doesnt hold your hand. It lets you find your own way, and when you win, you feel great!

title: Super 1 Foods
description:

Check out these time- and money-saving features:

‚Ä¢ Circulars: View our Super Low Prices in your store‚Äôs weekly circular.

comments: This app, coupled with excellent curb service makes my shopping so simple and convenient. Bye-bye grocery store lines.

It won't let me add items to my lists. It used to confirm with 'Item added to list' now it doesn't do anything & sometimes it freezes up completely. I've tried uninstalling/reinstalling, clearing cache, force stop but nothing works. ü§∑üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏èü§¶üèæ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è It's useless.

The curbside pickup is AMAZING!! Love being able to add to my grocery list through out the week and check out when I'm paid! They text to make sure you didn't forget anything or if you would like to add anything to your order also. You text when you pull up and they bring it out and load it for you! such a great app and service! thanks!!
Has worked well for a few years. Now it will not save to list or add to cart without seizing. ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è Galaxy Note 4, 8 and 9.

I absolutely love the idea of buying my groceries online and being able to pick them up without having to go into the grocery store, but the search engine being used for this app and on the website are both terrible. I use to be the pricing specialist where I buy my groceries from so I know for fact what the store has and does not have, but the search engine will tell me item not found. This drives me nuts. Walmart's app and online is much easier to navigate.

title: Super Rapid's World - Super Jungle World 2020
description:
Super Rapid's World is a classic platform adventure game and a super adventure of jungle world, a jungle boy want to become a treasure hunter.
One day, he found an ancient map in the warehouse of his grandfather, it leads to the super jungle world.
You will be joining in thrilling world adventures to rescue your princess who is being kidnapped by the evil.
In this adventure, you must jump and run over obstacles, also must smash enemies, climb up huge stairs and mountains, and explore castles.
Eat mushrooms to enlarge your body, or find items on your adventure path.

Features:
- So much scenes: jungle, frozen, cave
- Addictive game-play
- Amazing graphics
- Addictive game play
- Challenging level design
- Fun for all ages
- Moving background music and sound effects.
- 9 challenging enemies: red snake, giant snail, yellow hornet, cloud pig and more secret enemies etc.
- Pick up items to become bigger, invincible or obtain ability of throwing ball.
- Hidden warp world.
- Jump on the top of enemy to defeat them.
- Break brick to release power-up item.

How to play:
- Use button to jump, move and fire
- Find weapon in flowers
- Kill enemies by firing or jumping on their head
- Tap Left + Right to move around.
- Tap Left + Right to swing vine.
- Jump on the top of enemy to defeat them, or throw ball at them
- Collect millions coins as many as you can to unlock new levels and gather power-up items.
- Tap Jump button to break brick.
- Hold Jump button for a while to jump higher.
- Stand on the top of tunnel for while to enter into it.

Super Adventure is the greatest platform adventures for your android!
Play game will brings your childhood back with old school game-play.

title: Super Onion Boy - Pixel Game
description:
Super Onion Boy is a fun platform game, your mission is to save the princess from the terrible monster that imprisoned her in a magic bubble, defeat all the monsters along the way and dodge obstacles until you reach the final boss and save the princess!

[SUPER POWERS]

Try to catch all the super powers for Super Onion Boy to get stronger with invincibility, super leap, firepower and others.

Collect coins and find hidden lives and stars in secret places to earn extra lives.
Try to be Leaderboard leaderboards first and challenge your friends.

[FEATURES]

- Fun and jumping and flying game with 8-pixel and 16-bit 2D graphics (classic retro style).

- Music and Sound effects in the retro style of 8 and 16 bits.

- System of better score and better time in Leaderboard.

Super Onion Boy is an incredible game for the whole family, if you like classic games in retro style you will love this one!

comments: Do you like Mario games, but want them to be harder? Then Super onion boy is for you! Use power-ups such as fireball and floaty bubble. Yeah, it sounds like a Mario rip-off, but still, it's fun non the less! The game is a lot harder though, it took me several days to get to level 10(though I'm what you call a noob)Meanwhile in Mario, play 3 levels, and skip half the game. I would definitely recommend this to anyone who wants a 16-bit Mario like game on the go.

title: Power Girls Super City - Superhero Salon & Pets
description:
Become a superhero with Power Girls and their miraculous pets! When Super City calls for help, catch the monsters and turn them into friendly super citizens!
 
Each Power Girl has a special superpower: beautiful Blaze can control fire, sweet Moana‚Äôs superpower is water and charming Flora has the power of nature. And each of them has a cute pet sidekick: miraculous fox Sparky for Blaze, deer Daisy for Flora and seal Misty for Moana!

Save the city and help the creatures!
Power Girls, assemble! It's time to save Super City from monsters! River Monster is blocking the river flow! Ice Monster is freezing everything! Trash Monster is littering the city! Fire Monster sets everything it touches on fire! Save the city and help the monsters find a better home!

Style superhero looks!
Organize a relaxing spa day for Moana and do her hair and makeup! Choose a perfect girly outfit for sweet Flora. Dress up fox Sparky, deer Daisy and seal Misty in cool superhero outfits!

Have fun with Power Girls!
Cooking with superpowers is super fun! Blaze loves to use her special fire powers in the kitchen and makes the best pasta ever! Take the coolest photos with the Super Girls and their superhero animal helpers!

title: Super Call Recorder
descriptionHTML:
Super Call Recorder will record your phone calls in real-time. Compared to other similar apps, it has the following advantages:
1. Powerful: we can record both sides voices of incoming and outgoing calls on most devices; (NOTE: As the call-recording function is depended on the system behavior of your device, so we can NOT GUARANTEE this APP will work on every Android devices. Please contact us by email if you have any problem when using this APP. Email: callrecorder.mhm@gmail.com )
2. Completely free, and support most models of Android phones version 5.0 to 9.0;
3. The recorded voice sounds clear, you can use the app built-in playback and easily export your recorded calls to the SD card, and send by email, WhatsApp or other means;
4. Automatic recording to mp3 format with built-in playback.
summary: Super Call Recorder can record your phone calls in real-time

title: [3D Platformer] Super Bear Adventure
description:
Super Bear Adventure is a 3D platformer game inspired by late 90s games.
Explore the Turtle village and the Snow Valley, discover secrets, talk to the kingdom's inhabitants, collect as many coins as possible, unlock hats and fight your enemies and free the imprisoned bears !
Discover this universe and its characters through real-time cinematics !
This game is currently under development, it's not complete yet but it's frequently updated.

Game made by St√©phane HULOT
Musics made by Jon Clive Davis ( https://bit.ly/clivemusic )

comments: Dis game is awesome! It has NO lag when I play it, graphics are amazing, mechanics are perfect, and all characters are cool. I like the bears above all because they're sssoooooooooo cute 'n cuddly. However, I wish you could give the player more idol movements... I mean, I think that he should be able to do more than scratch his head. Anyhoo, I recommend this awesome game to all ages.üëçüëåüëè

This game is so great. It's pretty chill until the end. But there, the end level/ boss is just epic and a bit challenging. I also love the plot twist. Please don't change the end boss for the final version. (I really love the giant house stage. I like that concept, ) this game is just good, because it also proves, that mobile games can be really good, but a multiplayer feature would be great

This was an amazing game! I usually don't rate or leave reviews, but after just playing that game, I have to. I downloaded it because I was bored and wanted a not puzzle game, and what I got was this amazing game! Bosses weren't too hard, except maybe for the dessert one, because it was very far to have to go, but other than that I loved it! Okay bye

Please port this to nintendo switch. Every detail of the world is brimming with detail. For example, when you go underwater in the game the music gets distorted and it sounds like you're actually under water. Yeah you heard me this free mobile game has ADAPTIVE SOUND. Serious banjo-kazooie vibes. The controls are well thought out, and i'm suprised you were able to make so many moves work with only two buttons. However i find using the touch screen to be a bit clunky. Port to switch when complet

This is a very good and amazing game that I respect a lot! Their are things I would love getting added to the game (will change update after update): Make the hive an actual level with bears to save, not just a place to get to the final boss. Also, would it be fine to add a crouch button for doing long jump, high jump/backflip, or even slide? Maybe have some kind of upgrade system? And even have some extra worlds that requires gold trophies instead of just bears? Its fine if you don't want to.

title: Super Phantom Cat
description:
Surprise! Thank you our fans and Google Play for rewarding us with the BEST OF 2016 GAMES!

4.5/5 - "It is a pretty perfect hybrid of the new and old." - TouchArcade
- - - - - - - - - - - -

Super Phantom Cat is a retro-inspired 2D platformer that pays homage to 8- and 16-bit classics games. In Super Phantom Cat, players take on the role of Chemist White and embark on an action-packed journey through the Phantom World.

- - - - - - - - - - - -

When Chemist White was a small child, he was saved by Super Phantom Cat -- who then became his personal hero. Years later, Flash Cat takes Chemist White on a journey to the Phantom World; there, Chemist White discovers he can collect data shards and change into a number of characters -- including the all-powerful Super Phantom Cat :)  

The world of Super Phantom Cat is filled with challenges that will make any platforming fan jump for joy. 
You‚Äôll need quick reflexes as you pull off incredible feats such as bouncing on a monster‚Äôs head to land on a difficult-to-reach platform or rapidly jumping between small platforms to get across a massive chasm. You‚Äôll need to be inch-perfect if you want to make it to the end.

ÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºä

‚Ä¢	A modern twist on retro platformers with a quirky plot

‚Ä¢	Clean, colorful art and whimsical character design

‚Ä¢	Awesome chiptune soundtrack

‚Ä¢	Hardcore platforming gameplay that‚Äôs perfectly tuned for touchscreens

‚Ä¢	Fully customizable controls

‚Ä¢	Bonus levels for even more challenge and depth 

‚Ä¢	Endearing unlockable characters ranging from a cute chicken to a menacing vampire (everything in between)

‚Ä¢	Only two IAPs, which are used to get energy drinks and unlock special characters

ÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºäÔºä

If you have any ideas on how we can improve our game, please let us know :)

Send email: gp@veewo.com
Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/veewosupercat/
Follow us on Twitter: @VeewoGames and @SuperPhantomCat

You‚Äôll need quick reflexes as you pull off incredible feats such as bouncing on a monster‚Äôs head to land on a difficult-to-reach platform or rapidly jumping between small platforms to get across a massive chasm. You‚Äôll need to be inch-perfect if you want to make it to the end.

comments: Super fun game! I love the design and the animations, it's challenging and fun! The only thing I dislike is that u have to wait for energy to refill.... This takes away a bit of the fun because I play games to pass the time and it's no fun to get a game that makes u wait to play further. Other than that tiny flaw, this is an amazing game and I highly recommend it!

I'm going to make this review to blanket this and the 2nd game just coz:) I'd like to thank the devs of this platformer and just say it's (the Super Phantom Cat 1 & 2) an excellent duo of platforming and light to medium puzzle solving that evokes a lot of the 90s Playstation 1 greatness such as Klonoa, Crash Bandicoot (if in 2d only ofc), Stuart Little, and Toy Story 2 among others. The aesthetic of this game is most similar though to Fez on the Xbox 360. A great mix of gameplay elements 4sho!!

I wish I could give this app five stars but there's two things keeping me from it: 1. There's no option to pay a small fee for no ads. Whether you like it or not, even though they offer other in app purchases, you can't buy your way out of the candy crush promotions at the end of each level. 2. It uses a RIDICULOUS amount of battery power. It completely drained my battery, even when my phone was PLUGGED IN. I even tested my phone to make sure the battery wasn't just gone on it.

I love this game so much. This game has amazing graphics and a really good gameplay so I would recommend you getting this game. I just got a new controller and I Bluetoothed it and it worked on this game
This is a really well polished, 2d platformer about a cat who wants to get super powers, of sorts. It reminds me of a really smooth version of mario 1, with some more hidden secrets. I love it.

title: Run Run Super V
description:
Run. Ride. Volt In!

Be a hero and defend the world from the vile Emperor Negatron! Run through the city, get on your vehicle, and use your super robot to stop Negatron‚Äôs monsters from taking over the world!

*Featured on TouchArcade's hot new action games list 

Game Features:

‚òÖ Action-packed runner - Run through the city with simple tap controls. Collect power-ups and use weapons to defeat Negatron‚Äôs robot minions!

‚òÖ Super fun vehicle mode - Fly through the skies with the vehicle power-up! Collect bonus coins and blast through flying enemies with easy ‚Äútap-and-hold to fly, release to descend‚Äù controls

‚òÖ Epic robot boss battles - Your vehicles volt in to form a super robot! Customize your robot‚Äôs attacks (from arm rockets to a blazing sword!) and use them in real-time battles against giant monsters

‚òÖ Level up for battle! - Run to level up and unlock new gear and robot battles! Lots of cool characters, items, and vehicles to collect and upgrade

*This game is currently available in English, Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish, French, Russian, Thai, Korean, Japanese and Simplified Chinese.

Additional permissions:

- WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - This permission is used for saving ads that we serve in exchange for in game items like extra lives, gems and coins. Allowing this permission makes it easy to serve ads and helps you manage data consumption.
- READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE - This permission goes with the above, and is only used to show ads already saved on your storage.
- GET_ACCOUNTS - This permission is needed by google cloud messaging to allow us to send you notifications for the game.

title: Super Crime Steel War Hero Iron Flying Mech Robot
description:
Super Crime Steel War Hero - Iron Flying Mech Robot is a city simulator in third person view (and FPS mode), where you drive a car or a motorbike. Become a chief on the streets of anti criminality in town. You play is a grand hero / avenger / legend and whole city fears you. Exciting gameplay: you are waiting for the most hotspots of criminality in Vegas disctrict. Your rope mission is to rescue town people from gang attacks. The style of city is similar to Miami or Las Vegas but actualy it's New York.  

Good old story about a anti car thief in a dangerous town. Dominate the city with a devastating firepower of advanced military vehicles or upgrade your hero to knock down enemies in a few kicks! Let it be as a beautiful city, do not turn into crime city with blood and robbery.
Are your ready for great anti criminal adventure? Be ready to rob, kill, shoot and fight all the criminals like a ninja! Stealing auto cars, racing through streets, and shooting down gangsters. Do you have enough guts to rise to the top of the criminal piles? Try out all the supercars and bikes. Make stunts on a bmx or find an ultimate F-90 tank or devastating battle helicopter.

Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive supercars, shoot guns and more in this free open world game! Explore the crime city, full of gangs and aggressive fractions. Become citizen hope as a standard of pure law and justice, or come to the city as a new doom knight.You can also buy a lot of things in a shop to help you complete missions and release the city from all mafia sinners.

You have special real powers. You can shoot dangerous laser beam from your eyes. You can shoot a rope to a building and climb over the building to the top. Your legs also very powerful. Don't underestimate them. Don't mess with the police, they are the good ones.

Most of the missions will be on streets, some will be in chinatown district and other gang lands etc. You were on a Incredible superhero secret mission, stealing the important information about the enemies, the army base camps, rebels and the underworld Mafia. You will fight various star mafia gangsters from America, Russia, China, Mexico, Japan etc. The game contains fully Open world Environment. 


‚Ä¢ Guns, molotovs and grenades to buy and shoot
‚Ä¢ Off road terrains to explore
‚Ä¢ Visually stunning graphics, character and army vehicle models, Helicopter, Air fighter, etc.
‚Ä¢ HD quality graphics

title: Super Phantom Cat 2
description:
Meet Ari. He's on a journey to rescue his sister, Ina, who has been kidnapped in the mysterious Phantom world. He's determined. He's focused. But super-scary enemies, super powers, allies and hidden secrets await him.  

In Super Phantom Cat 2, you can possess the best Phantom superpowers yet: 
¬∑ Bounce higher and higher to reach for the sky and stars.
¬∑ Float on balloons into the Wild Woods and Alps.
¬∑ Break walls, stone, and metal.
¬∑ Shrink and enlarge monsters with the touch of a finger. 
¬∑ Turn irritating critters into ice statues. 
¬∑ Shift to invincible mode if danger still prevails.  

Play as one of many characters, such as: 
¬∑ The lead singer and guitarist of a band.
¬∑ A dancer who plays pranks and dresses up as a skeleton.
¬∑ A pink-haired magician who is a master of cards.
¬∑ A funky teen skater obsessed with extreme sports.
¬∑ An adventurous cowboy always on a lookout for treasure. 
¬∑ And champions from Mushroom stomping, Juice blending and Cuteness competitions. 

Plus... 

¬∑ Find hidden secrets in the mysterious Phantom World. 
¬∑ Discover different levels and checkpoints. 
  
It's a purr-iceless experience for everyone!

In Super Phantom Cat 2, you can own props, which save you from cata-astrophe. If cats have nine lives, you can earn even more!  

¬∑ Create props based on your own requirements. ¬∑ Whether you are a beginner or a master at platform games, you need these props to complete your mission.  

Wait, there's more... 

From the creators of Super Phantom Cat, which featured in the Google Play's "Best of 2016," Super Phantom Cat 2 is the hottest, baddest platform game of 2017.

comments: I still need to manually save my progress since it doesn't auto save after leaving the app just like most games. It lso has the tendency to freeze to loading screen after opening your saved progress. Happened a lot of times and only way to play the game is to go back to the start and lose your progress. Uninstalling the game now, bye.

The gameplay is great, but you have to pay/watch ads for keys to experience the full game. I can understand having ads interrupt a free game, and I understand making you grind if you don't want to pay/watch ads. But it's ridiculous if there's literally no other way to complete the game than to pay/watch ads. Total pay to win. Disappointed because the first game was so good, but I refuse to play games like this.

when i first time played this game, It was so fun, but when I watch ads(for like 4-5 times) to have 1 key, 1 heart to survive, to receive hero fragments, and diamonds, It just take me back to home screen and I have to enter it again, and to most huge problem is that it take me back to beggining except my level was 7 and when I check the heroes, they are all locked up. PLEASE IM BEGGING YOU ! . YOU MUST FIX THIS GAME TO MAKE IT MORE ENJOYABLEüò¢üò≠.

This game is phenomenal. Console level gameplay! Yes it has ads but you got options to "buy" this hame full on the in game store‚Äîwhich you DEFINITELY got to do when it has special offer. It is INSANELY cheap for what you got out of it: Beautiful graphics, absolutely smooth gameplay, exactly what Mobile Gaming NEEDS!

I adored this game when I was younger and decided to download it on my current phone, but while it saves my level and coins, it won't remember which levels I've done. It's infuriating, and I've uninstalled it now. A damn shame.

recentChanges: Bug fixed and performance improved
comments: I like this game. The concept is so different and gets you thinking. Yes, the English is horrible but I was okay with that. My biggest annoyance with this game is how many videos they have you watch. I PAID for no ads. Instead, you get a video in-between every single question. Or even when you want a hint. Waste of money. I wish they least made the videos come once every couple minutes or questions. Don't bother playing it cause it's a waste of time.

The puzzles themselves will test your lateral thinking skills, although I did think of alternate answers to the odd one or two that the developer seemed not to have realised were there. However, the app does bombard you with frequent ads, which is a tad counterproductive. If people uninstall an app, as I'm about to do, because the ads are too annoying, then what happens to your overall ad revenue? It decreases. Serving 10 ads to one person pays less than serving 1 ad to 15 people. Simples!

I have installed other games like this and love them. Unfortunately for this game the controls are a bit slow. When I have to tilt my phone or shake my phone on certain levels it takes quite a while for it to register in the game. After a while it gets annoying to be violently shaking my phone like a crazy person just for the game to not register it.

I could not play free there are so much advertisements during the playing. And again you have to wait 10-15 second waste of time. Thank you for understanding me creators. I hope so you can manage above advertisements

It's really a brain teaser but u should most definitely get it it's free I really like this game it's really fun and it's a game were you can pass your phone around the room to all your friends and have reach person answer a question and if they can't answer it then pass it on see who can answer the most questions have fun play fair

At the start of level we are shown full map and the character b...

The stickman ultimate fight was very nice. A good challenge but not impossible. I was far into the stickman ultimate fight at about level 100. I rested and did my homework. Later, I went back into the stickman ultimate fight and started at level one again. I didnt press anything, but I still had to start over. It says no bugs. Im very disappointed.

This is easily the most realistic and most fun mobile hockey stickman hero. I do have one complaint, and that is that you should update the teams OVR accordingly every NHL season, and you should also allow the players to mess with the OVRs. I want to play as Colorado in all stickman heroolay modes, and there is no ...

I really like it and its very addictive, but that means I also finished it quite fast even when I returned over and over to get 3 stars. (yes, I won the stickman ultimate fight with 100% of the stars.) it was really good, but I wished there were more levels.

title: Super Fleets - Classic
description:
Super Fleets is a naval-battle-themed strategy mobile game with vivid graphics and tactical confrontation, providing players an immersing experience in real maritime wars. A vast expanse of world map, scattered with bases of thousands of players and rich resource mines, supports multiple 1v1 or group battles between players at the same time. Collect resources, establish your own fleet, upgrade technologies and dominate the seas! You can also compete with other players in arena or trans-server battles. With your understanding of tactics and flexible strategy, you can lead your fleet to glory! What one needs to do to achieve these goals is very simple and straight-forward, even for those unfamiliar with this game type. You will get a comprehensive initial guidance from the beginning of the game and you can get help whenever you ponder on what to do next. Just click with your fingertips and you can conquer the world! 

Features: 
Exquisite and vivid depiction of warship details makes you feel watching real naval battles right before your eyes!
Every battle, either against NPC or real player, requires a well-designed tactic, including the choice of warship types and formation positioning. Every little change will make a big difference in the result of the battle: total defeat, victory by narrow margin or total victory!

With very simple operations, everyone can grasp how to play the game well in a few minutes. You can fight a war with the touch of a few fingers on the palm of one hand!

A huge world map dotted with player bases and resource mines here and there, supporting 1-on-1 battles or wars between Legions. Sounds exciting only picturing it, right? 

Collect resources, establish your own fleet, upgrade technologies and dominate the sea!

A free chance of lottery draw everyday, allowing you to build an advanced fleet early in the game!

„ÄêMasses of warships herald the war„Äë
The Armada once dimmed the sky with innumerable masts and sails. The British Royal Fleet once planted British flags all over the world. The Hochsee Flotte once fought with all its might and almost changed the history...... Now your super fleet is setting sails to fight for its future. Are you ready?
 
„ÄêTake the initiative to launch attacks and dominate the sea„Äë
Where my fleet sails is where my justice lies. Inshore defense is not the best choice for an ambitious fleet. Only fighting on the high sea leads to power and hegemony! Once you leave the base, you will find many targets to loot! 

„ÄêCommand your fleet to cross the T„Äë
Weaken your enemies before they attack you. Minimize the damage taken when attacked by enemies. Cripple your enemies at once when you get the chance to attack. These are the key points in naval battles. Use different formations with the same warships against the same enemy will lead to completely different results.

comments: I played for a long long time, spending some money several hundred) along the way. At first the game was fun and tasks didn't require so many elements that were hard to come by free. After countless server mergers there were multiple people who spend thousands upon thousands of dollars on this game and that just makes it no fun for anyone else. Figure something out to spenders together and non spenders together.

Been playing this game since the original s.16 server and while I enjoy it, I'm concerned with how the game seems to pop an android notification the the app has force closed whenever I open banking, finance, browser or other apps not even related. This happens even when I have closed the app properly. I then have to go to app info and force stop the app or it constantly crashes. Not sure why my banking and credit apps trigger this but it is concerning to say the least.
Can be a pretty fun game but it's definitely a pay to win kind of game. The support is non existent. All the means of contact don't work.

Marginal fun, but got old quickly. Was fun to level up at first, but soon it took hours to upgrade everything. Challenging with lots of variables and tasks. Takes a while to figure them all out, as there are no instructions written in King's English. However, as others have mentioned, even if you are minding your own business, the pre-teen sloths who waste Mommy and Daddy's money will stalk you and there is no defense. Had my entire fleet thrashed while helplessly mining oil. Uninstalled.

Slow response when operating game, the game restricts and changes parameters constantly and it's obvious. Waste of money big time. The game manipulates battles and key progress during games and events. The developers change game and produce updates without any info on what the update is or when they change programming. Overall this game cheats, manipulates and misleads all players.

title: Kicko & Super Speedo
description:
He will jump, he will fight, and turn all wrong to right! 7-year old Kicko is humble, polite & gentle but also super strong. He always fights for the right & is a loving & helpful friend! While Super Speedo is not just his super-duper car. It is also a great & resourceful friend. It's made entirely of laser lights, is bulletproof & can move at incredible speeds!

Kicko & Super Speedo is a fun-filled endless running game where the extremely shrewd Joker with his equally evil partners in crime - Magnet Man and Dr. Crazy is on a rampage and seeks to destroy Sun City. Join Kicko on his quest to stop the Joker from bringing harm to the city. Let the chase begin!

Run on the streets of Sun City and collect as many coins you can. Slide through concrete pipes. Jump over incoming cars and barricades. Tackle through Magnet Man and Dr. Crazy to stay out of their reach and get back on your quest to capture Joker. Grab Magnets on the run to collect all the nearby coins. Seize all the Shields on your way and run through obstacles. Use Power Boots to boost up your speed and help Kicko narrow down the distance between him and Joker. 

Do not forget to call your friend Super Speedo. Give your run a Super Speedo Start or a Super Speedo Megastart and earn extra points. Use the Super Speedo Wings on your way and collect easy coins while you fly high in the sky. Nab Tyres as special collectibles on your chase for Joker through Sun City and exchange them for more coins. Coins are really useful as they help you upgrade your Power-ups to last longer.

Participate in daily challenges and earn extra rewards. Take up various missions and complete them to increase your XP multiplier. Collect fireball Tokens on the run and use them to revive when needed. Connect and play with your Facebook friends and challenge them to beat your high score. 

Play Kicko and Super Speedo and discover the ‚ÄúMasti‚Äù of Sun City‚Äôs superhero.
‚Ä¢ EXPLORE the vibrant Sun City
‚Ä¢ DODGE, JUMP, and SLIDE through obstacles
‚Ä¢ Collect COINS, gather REWARDS and complete MISSIONS
‚Ä¢ Use Super Speedo powers for SUPER SPEEDO START and MEGASTART
‚Ä¢ Get Free Spins and earn Lucky Rewards with the SPIN WHEEL
‚Ä¢ Accept the DAILY CHALLENGE to earn extra Rewards
‚Ä¢ SCORE THE HIGHEST and beat your friends using exciting power-ups

- The game is also optimized for tablet devices.

- This game is completely free to download and play. However, some game items can be purchased with real money within the game. You can restrict in-app purchases in your store‚Äôs settings.

* *Permissions:
1. READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE and WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
This permission is needed to cache and read ad content during the gameplay.

2. ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
To determine your location for region-based offers.

3. RECORD_AUDIO
This is required to analyze offline TV viewing data and serve media-targeted ads. Granting this permission is optional. If you'd like to opt-out of this targeting, please visit the following link: http://www.zapr.in/privacy/
